title: Aiming for B5
body:
First prov, I win 7/10 and get S3
Second time, I win 5/10 and get S5
So next season, if I get 0/10 would I get B5?

So I made a little list of things to do and test for the next series to see if it would succeed at low elo or carry me to B5:
Top Lane:
-Take top half of jg
-Either go ham 100% or farm 100%
-Push and die for turrets

Mid:
-Take jg wraiths (or whatever u call them now)
-Focus on cs and ignore enemy laner

ADC:
-Farm all laning phase and at team fights, poke and ks
-When fed, go ham
-Ask support not to engage or go a passive champ and if they do engage, let them die

Sup:
-If you see the adc in a bad position, do not die for them
-If bot lane is already hopeless, go help another lane. Pressure and make them lose cs or kill them

Jungle:
-Don't gank and get feral flare thing
-Don't give midlaner blu unless theyre going 8/0
-Push turrets late game

Assasin:
-Don't go in with the team for teamfights
-Go around the back and die for the high priority squishies (if not fed, farm jungle)

In general:
-Ks when available
-Take jungle
-Get sweeping lens and buy wards instead
-Continually play unfamiliar/shit at champs
-Instalock and if don't get position, go duo top
-Verbal harassment/toxic: Ignore and if they keep going, continue on to laugh at their persistence
-If teammate in trouble in which you know you'll die if you help, don't help them
-Spam yer pings (and watch yourself get ignored and that guy get gangraped)
-Positive attitude

/end
